thread.title: Geek deals: Lenovo ThinkPad T440p dual-core 14-inch laptop for $819
thread.title_full: Geek deals: Lenovo ThinkPad T440p dual-core 14-inch laptop for $819

author: Editor - Technology News
title: Geek deals: Lenovo ThinkPad T440p dual-core 14-inch laptop for $819
text:
Lenovo ThinkPad T440p dual-core 14-inch laptop for $819 (List price: $1553.20) 
Inside, this configuration includes a fourth generation dual-core 2.9GHz Intel Core i7-4600M processor, an Nvidia GeForce 730M graphics card (with 1GB of memory), a 500GB 7200RPM hard drive, a DVD burner, Bluetooth 4.0, 8GB of DDR3L RAM (1600MHz), and 802.11b/g/n/ac WiFi support. And the 14-inch display? It benefits from LED backlighting and an HD+ resolution of 900p. 
With an all-day battery, a 1.17-inch thick chassis, and an ultra durable design, this affordable little machine has a lot to offer for heavy travelers. At 4.75 pounds, it’s on the heavy side, but the available horsepower here is definitely worth the tradeoff. 
While Windows 7 Professional (64-bit) comes installed by default, it also comes with a license for Windows 8 Pro (64-bit). And since the Windows 10 upgrade is free until July of 2016, you’re eligible to upgrade to the latest and greatest OS out of Redmond. 
Typically, this model sells for $1553.20, but Lenovo currently running a massive sale on its online store. When you buy directly, you’ll only be paying $819 (plus any applicable taxes) for the ThinkPad T440p. On top of that, Lenovo also offers free standard shipping via UPS, so the total value here is even better.
